name: Azurn Networks
overview:
The Azurn Group’s patented communication technologies combine a wide range of voice, data and video sources, enabling real time, multi-party interactivity and providing underlying content solutions. These patented technologies have recently been used in the educational market to enhance teaching and learning opportunities. The technology is currently being rolled out globally.

Companies around the world can now take complete control of their information communications and technology needs. With AZURN’s Unified XMLTM soft-switch hardware users can integrate their voice, data, mobile, video and conferencing needs without depending on a telecommunications provider or investing in new systems.

The AZURN Multimedia Solution based on its Multimedia Convergence Platform, The Azurn MERLIN, delivers the technology for companies to truly bridge the gap to meet both internal and external communications needs.

An information communication and technology revolution has begun.
